paramInformation.label: Light Level Threshold
paramInformation.description: Activate floodlight and send Basic Set Command when PIR is triggered while light level is below this threshold.

metadata.inclusion:
Z-Wave auto inclusion.
Or manual inclusion : put the Z-Wave controller into inclusion mode, press the Link button 3 times within 1.5 seconds to put the unit into inclusion mode
metadata.exclusion: Put the Z-Wave Controller into exclusion mode. Press the Link button 3 times within 1.5 seconds to put the unit into exclusion mode
metadata.reset: The product reset is to operate only when the primary controller is missing or inoperable. Press the Link button 3 times within 1.5 seconds to put the unit into exclusion mode.Within 1 second of step 1, press the Link button again and hold until LED is off (about 5 seconds)
